channel.title: King killed through guards and buggy messages about that
channel.description:
#### What happened? I guarded myself as a King, but was killed by Assasin or Sellsword. I also got a message said I was immune, but still died.
#### What was SUPPOSED to happen? King had to survive or receive correct message about why did he die.
#### Steps to reproduce: I attached 2 screenshots where you can see all you need: confusing message, King's death and list of all player's roles.
#### Comments:![Bugs1|690x388](upload://7VLLgYBXFgMT6tOVgH2KZlokSo1.jpg)![Bugs2|690x388](upload://nr2CYxeTBx1clhWB4ASjFXfV9xC.jpg)

item.title: King killed through guards and buggy messages about that
item.dc:creator: geoelectric
item.description:
Maybe Sellsword revenge doesn’t honor guards?

Read full topic

item.title: King killed through guards and buggy messages about that
item.dc:creator: beo
item.description:
I should have mentioned that I accused MM in previous day and Sellsword seemed to be contracted to MM, so Sellsword could attack me last night. So both Assasin and Sellsword could attack me last night.

Butler was already dead by last night. Also I think Butler can’t occupy King.

Read full topic

item.title: King killed through guards and buggy messages about that
item.dc:creator: Navi
item.description:
Alchemists previously had a bug where their emerald potion could kill possessors through their passive night immunity with no extra warning or message. Perhaps that’s what’s happened here?

Read full topic
item.source: King killed through guards and buggy messages about that

item.title: King killed through guards and buggy messages about that
item.dc:creator: Dooku
item.description:
It looks like you were attacked twice that night, as per the two attack msgs.

But it doesn’t look like any of the killing classes had the ability to bypass immunity so I’m at a lose. I was going to guess butler occupied you but it would have said do. Sorry that I can’t be of assistance in this case.

Read full topic
